headline: AMETEK’s (NYSE:AME) Q2 Sales Top Estimates, Stock Soars
summary: Electronic products manufacturer AMETEK (NYSE:AME) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 2.5% year on year to $1.78 billion. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $1.79 billion at the midpoint, 0.9% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.78 per share was 5.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Compared to Estimates, Ametek (AME) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for Ametek (AME) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended June 2025, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: Ametek (AME) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Ametek (AME) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.95% and +2.96%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Ametek: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of eight analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.68 per share. The maker of electronic instruments and electromechanical devices posted revenue of $1.78 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.73 billion.

headline: AMETEK Announces Record Second Quarter Results and Raises Full Year Guidance
